website_summaries.verdict: A clean-looking, simple medicine cabinet that will fit well in any bathroom.
pros: Choose left swing or right swing
cons: Some have complained about the quality of the hinges

customer_reviews.title: WOW! This thing is outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought anything from an Amazon 2nd seller before, but dannnnnng. It arrived faster than Amazon prime deleivers. Item was PERFECT! And wow does it look good. This is a weird size and from HD or Lowe’s wanted $300 for a plastic POS. This thing is high end looking. Can’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Yes, 5 STARS! This is beautiful, feels solid, and looks quite well made. Upgrading a 36 year old bathroom, and the medicine cabinet was cheap plastic inside - as well as ugly. This is a nice size, very solid feel. Easy install. The packaging - from Amazon - was superb! The interior box, from Koehler, had ample styrofoam around it for a ride in the back of the car. Amazon's box was easily 6"=8" taller and longer, allowing for tons of recycled packing materials. Impressed with not only the product, but the packing. YES, I will buy it again (when it's time to redo the other bathroom)!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Medicine Cabinet but Doors can't be Adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and installed the medicine cabinet level and plumb. However, the top of the door was 1/4 inch out of adjustment (top of the door wouldn't close.) I went to the instructions to adjust the door and it shows 3 screws that would provide the necessary adjustment up/down, in/out but there is only 1 screw that is attached to a clip. I tried to move the hinge but with one screw the adjustment was at best 1/16 of an inch, certainly not enough to close the gap at the top of the door. It is disappointing that Kohler's instructions and product are different.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Love the mirrors inside and out
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived in excellent condition in original carton, securely packaged. The medicine cabinet was used in a remodel and the location changed from the old bath, so framing was required including cutting out an existing stud. This was not too bad as the walls were opened to the framing anyway. After framing was done four screws were required to mount the unit. It has a nice clean, minimal but modern look. The mirror on the back of the door and inside the cabinet are nice touches.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Ray

customer_reviews.title: Damage unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: This item came without packing materials & damaged at upper right corner. Very disappointed and understand why mirror was broken. Window tirme to return has expired. Not worth $$$. Update October 2019...Amazon sent replacement and was received with packing materials, installed & beautiful. Should of ordered surface mount instead as couldn't fully recessed into wall. Recommend when listing these products they should all be on same page & let customer select the mount options. Gets too confusing to find & order correct item when listed separately.
customer_reviews.author: GGG

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered is not the size indicated
customer_reviews.text: Here we are in the covid crisis where we count on being able to order things that are accurate to the specifications provided, and 2 major corporations, Amazon and Kohler, fail. Ordered this because as you can see in the drawing picture, it indicates the glass is 16"x20". It is not. They cheap out. It's 15 3/8" by 19.5". I'll add a picture with a tape measure if I can. I was trying to retrofit in a very specific location so I need accurate information. Extremely poor job, Amazon and Kohler. Now what do I do, risk going to a shipping store to return it?
customer_reviews.author: Pete Herz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price- not soft close
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a huge improvement over the 1970s style cheap medicine cabinets that are still so pervasive in homes today. It's mirrored inside and on the other side of the door, with glass shelves and fits nice and flush against the wall. My only complaint is that the door is not soft close. You would need to upgrade to other Kohler models to get that and the price nearly doubles. That being said, it's a small door and it isn't a deal killer. Nice, inexpensive way to upgrade your bathroom cabinets. In my case, it was perfect for a seldom used basement bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: DavidCT

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's just there. 3 mirrored surfaces for whatever reason. Plastic clips to hold shelves until they crack someday. Looks ok. Easy to install. Nowhere near as sturdy as the original cabinet built in the 50's but it'll do. I didn't bother drilling hole for installation as some did. Just made sure it was level and with appropritate sized phillips screwdriver applied a light force to get the screw digging into the wood and just kept turning. Screws aren't very large diameter.
customer_reviews.author: general user

customer_reviews.title: Really classy
customer_reviews.text: I had a handyman install this, but the hole in the wall was already there and the right size so, he just slipped it in, and I've been kicking myself ever since, because I could've done it myself and saved 50 bucks. The only hard part of this was getting the pegs in, and they were really tight so, I got an emery board and filed them down just a little so they'd fit. Now I have a new medicine cabinet and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived at scheduled time. Installed in 10 minutes. I have 1 in each house. The first is 4 years old and still looks new. Great buy for price. I love the mirror on the inside. One thing, put an extra screw opposite the side the door opens. Because its mirrored on both sides the door is heavy. I had to add an extra screw after a year or so due to weight. Really classy.
customer_reviews.author: hope4unme

customer_reviews.title: Koehler  produced a fine product
customer_reviews.text: I have specified Kohler products for years but never this one- ordered this for myself. I came quickly & was extremely well packed. The inside is bright & reflective - This is worth every penny. I have in 30 yrs. only had two product complaints which the Company made right very quickly. I don’t expect problems. I will update after time if anything changes my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Lautner

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got it "used" but it hadn't been. Everything as new. Perfect. As sturdy as glass can be, but here's the thing. My installer accidentally dropped the cellophane wrapped twin glass shelves on my terrazzo (marble, harder than concrete) floor. And it didn't chip, crack or break. The mirrors are thin and maybe more fragile - I'm not going to test it! Am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Keywester1

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cabinet to replace an old unsightly plastic one in a small bathroom. I was very impressed when it arrived well packaged and undamaged. After a quick and easy install, I was even more impressed with how this looks recess mounted in my wall. The two mirrors inside, [one on the backside of the door and the other in the back of the cabinet] are a very nice feature. This unit appears to be well made and of a little higher quality than most. One small negative was the plastic shelf holders were a little difficult to insert. I highly recommend this Kohler product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken A

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was a great replacement for old cabinet, fit perfect! I did not even have to make any new cuts in wall, just screwed it in place. It was by far one of the easiest upgrades/project ever! The cabinet is very pretty and spacious inside. As you can see, it is mirrored inside as well. This is a good look for a simple, modern style bathroom (has a sterile, medical office effect). Saw another review that said the front mirror slid off, hopefully that will not happen anytime soon. Overall, really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install since it fit the opening that was already in my wall
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new medicine cabinet and this was one of the only ones that fit the opening that I already had in my wall. It's looks very modern, but doesn't feel heavy duty by any means in comparison to the older one it is replacing. Decent for the money I suppose, but a lot lighter than I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing22

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great. I love that the inside is also mirrors. They absolutely package this to protect it from shipping the best they can. You can not take off stars or give it a bad review because it came damaged it is not the senders fault if it came that way. Mine came perfect and completely protected the best it could.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Smalich

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good unit and the price is very reasonable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good unit and the price is very reasonable. It was an extremely easy unit to install, as it was a replacement. The quality is extremely high and looks nice. I bought this unit sight unseen because my local home improvement stores did not carry it and I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with nice features!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I already had one this size and was looking to replace it. Home Depot or Lowe’s didn’t have one with the opening dimensions I needed and all were more money than I wanted to spend. This one fit perfectly, has an awesome feature of three mirrors (outside, inner door and back wall), and was under $80 ! Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Krys H24

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.  This is a mess
customer_reviews.text: Arrived completely broken. There was splinters everywhere. It took me over 2 hours to clean up and rebox
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: Our old medicine cabinet had seen better days and desperately needed to be replaced - this one is perfect!!! Love the inside glass and the shelves that can be set to each individual. Think we may have to order another for our second bathroom. Great, sturdy cabinet -- great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: FL beachbum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing upgrade for an 90’s bathroom recessed cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a stunning piece. We purchased a home with an old oak recessed cabinet and the size wasn’t that easy to find in stores. Stumbled on this one and one sale and our 90’s bathroom is looking more clean. The hinges are so smooth and it does open a little close to our main mirror so we put the two bumpers on the outside to stop it from hitting. We installed it in under 15 minutes. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and easy to install. Door opens right or left by flipping the unit around. Wish there was a protective edge of some type, plastic preferred, because it is easy to anticipate chipping around the exposed glass edge. Mirrors on the inside of the vanity are basically useless because items on the internal shelving blocks the view.
customer_reviews.author: altmann

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: I like this medicine cabinet for its mirrors on both sides of the door and on the inside of the cabinet. And the two adjustable shelves certainly make it easier to organize things in the cabinet. In addition, compared to the very inexpensive plastic medicine cabinets of similar style and size, this looks classy. I cannot comment on how easy or hard the installation is since I did not do it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small bathroom with a small window that is low enough to interfere with having a mirror over the sink. This mirror worked perfectly in that tight area. The beveled edge makes it look expensive, the option to change door opening side convenient, and the insides beautiful and well made with sturdy glass shelves. The price was perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: slick, perfect to small spaces
customer_reviews.text: watch the installation vid than reading the installation booklet, the vids is 5 min and you can install it without any need to look at the installation booklet, I love this item, shelves are sturdy, it has mirror everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Choobbari

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive recessed medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Good value and attractive. We were looking for a recessed medicine cabinet to fit a bathroom space in our older home. Disappointingly, this is only about half the size of the original one, but it looks good, and what do you need to keep in a medicine cabinet anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Recessed medicine cabinet exudes quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first 20" x 26" Kohler medicine cabinet as a new install in our master bath. It has lots of room, the shelves are well designed, and it has a mirror inside the door and back wall as well. It is quality built and adds to the decor of any bathroom. I liked the first one so much that I replaced the old recessed cabinets in the guest bath and half bath with identical Kohler 16" x 20" recessed cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Humdinger

customer_reviews.title: Okay but...
customer_reviews.text: Liked the cabinet except the plastic shelf brackets which were extremely hard to install. Couldn't try to hammer in because undoubtedly they'd break. Because I couldn't get them in far enough, the glass shelves wouldn't seat properly and were lopsided. I saw no other option but to buy other brackets.
customer_reviews.author: kayly

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: It the price is too good to be true, there’s something wrong. This box arrived taped up with blue painters tape, and the previous person’s packing label is still on the box but they cut it out with an exacto knife leaving the persons name. I’m missing 8 screws and 8 hole plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This vanity is beautiful! Easy for the contractor to install and love love love all the mirrored insides and the soft close on the door. Great quality and expect and received nothing less from Kohler.,
customer_reviews.author: funmom

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Well made with glass shelves, mirrored surfaces on the font and back of the door, and inside the cabinet itself. Very easy to install, took longer to get it out of the box! Bought a second one for my guest room due to its quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Hubby love it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy and easy to install. Love how secure the mirrored shelves are and adjustable. Would have been nice if the inside door mirror was magnified. LOL cant have everything! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheeros

customer_reviews.title: Three mirrors in one! Fantastic medicine cabinet, very clean.
customer_reviews.text: This medicine cabinet is perfect for our powder room. Sits very close to the wall, opens up to a mirror on the back of the door, mirror at the back of the cabinet and two adjustable glass shelves. Great use of space.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Not recessed size
customer_reviews.text: The product said recessed 16x20 on the website, but actual is 14.25 x 19.25. I thought if you say the recess, it should be the recessed size, not the mirror size. I have to discuss with my installer tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: 2Grapes

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! It fit right in the space after removing the old builder grade medicine cabinet. It has a full mirror on the other side so you have a close up to shave, apply make-up, groom eyebrows & beard. Mirror on the back wall of the unit & two thick glass shelves. Beveled edge. Well packed. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Doro

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this cabinet from Lowes only to be e-mailed days later it was unavailable. I went to my local Lowes store and bought a similar cabinet by Allen & Roth but it didn’t quite fit. I ordered this one and it fit like a glove. Better construction and better looking, hands down. Wife is happy, nuff said. Recommend. PS: the Lowes piece was $10 bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C in Davenport, FL

customer_reviews.title: Not quite 16x20
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful but looked small after it was installed by our bathroom guy. I decided to measure it and was very disappointed to find it was 15 1/4” by 19 1/2”. It doesn’t sound like much but it makes a big difference in the way it looks over the sink. I will have to decorate around it to hide the fact that it looks too small for the sink under it. The box had a small dent when it arrived. We checked the mirror for damage and didn’t notice the tiny chip on the lower corner of the mirror until after it was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Kohler K-CB-CLR1620FS
customer_reviews.text: I had my small bath completely renovated and slightly enlarged. After much researching and reading reviews for medicine cabinets, I decided on the Kohler. Although I was hesitant about having an item with so much glass shipped to me, the packaging was unbelievable. The Kohler box was place in a larger box and cradled all around in plastic coated Styrofoam. Some of the best packaging I have ever seen! My contractor had no problems installing the cabinet, the shelves fit nicely and the mirrors all around look great. I really like the beveled edge on the mirror on the outside of the door. It is a classy addition to my renovated bath.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy v

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is excellent in every way. It is designed well using good materials. The beveled mirror is a classy touch. The interior shelves are stable, functional, with no issues. You can put the hinges on the right or left depending on your needs. By the way, I received advice from other people that cabinets like this one were "out of style". DON'T listen to similar advice and thank God I didn't. You will not regret installing this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Nice bathroom cabinets with mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, good size and look nice. I like the mirror in the back of the cabinet, it lights everything up and makes it look classy. My wife wishes the front mirror was a little larger, but I knew the size going in. They were easy to mount in the wall and put the shelves in. My only comment is that it would be nice if there was a way make the door slow-closing (like modern kitchen cabinets), sometimes I forget since almost everything in our house is slow-closing and they slam a little hard.
customer_reviews.author: foofurrah

customer_reviews.title: solid, attractive, nice hinges
customer_reviews.text: I put this in place of a wood medicine cabinet that was a little taller so I made a niche under it. it seems sturdy and clean looking. The gray plastic that is visible on the door is not ideal but since we have gray walls its not so objectionable.
customer_reviews.author: TX gadget nutTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors, Mirrors on the wall!
customer_reviews.text: A smart modern look that’s easy to clean and offers another full set including the door and inside behind the shelves. Pretty easy to install, but that all depends on how they built your bathroom walls. A very sleek, functional wall unit that’s easy to clean and sturdy enough for a bust bathroom. We bought two and love them both!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Andersen

customer_reviews.title: DIMENSIONS ARE MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: The specs on this item are listed as 16x20...that is ONLY the outside of the cabinet; HOWEVER, being a recessed cabinet the interior dimensions are smaller. This caused me lots of work because the opening I made was 16x20 which was too big for the recessed interior dimensions. WHY aren't the interior dimensions listed?????
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Top quality medicine cabinet at good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and sturdy medicine cabinet. Top quality for less than many plastic bodied cabinets at the big box stores. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Patty J

customer_reviews.title: It added nicely to my bathroom renovation
customer_reviews.text: I really was impressed with this cabinet! It was reasonably priced, stylish and an eady install. After six months it shows zero wear. It added nicely to my bathroom renovation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Feragotti

customer_reviews.title: Kohler bathroom medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Stainless construction and mirror inside and out. Nice glass shelves. Well constructed and fit easily in correctly sized opening. Bought another after first one for the second bathroom to replace inferior plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Classy cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after checking both big-box stores in my area. The local choices were horrible, cheap tin or even cheaper melamine. I returned home just disgusted. I went on Amazon, I often forget the big ''A" has everything and saw this item. I read the description and was sold! It arrived and I opened the box to find the classiest medicine cabinet I've seen. It has a beveled mirror outside, another mirror inside the door and even a mirror on the back panel. Sturdy solid glass adjustable shelves and Kohler even provides tiny caps to fill-in the holes you don't use. One word-classy!
customer_reviews.author: HarleyD 04

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Good quality stainless steel frame and thick adjustable glass shelves. I like that there are mirrors on both sides of door. Mirrors are actual glass with no distortion. A lot of cheaper medicine cabinets have flimsy plastic mirrors that warp over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and understated
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beet the quality and style of this medicine cabinet . Compared to big box stores this stylish cabinet is a good deal and quite well made .
customer_reviews.author: WNC Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks and it 20 minutes to install and it looks great, very nicely finished. I went back and got another for my other bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlie

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet, far stronger and better looking than others I’ve owned. My only issue is that it arrived with a small chip in the mirror. Honestly not sure if it’s bad enough to go through the return process.
customer_reviews.author: James Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Well-made.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and extremely well-made. Our contractor even commented on that. I particularly like the mirror on the back of the door.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and modern upgrade for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Super easy upgrade to my bathrooms. Quick to install in about 15 min for a pre-existing wall hole. Looks so much more expensive than it was. Shelves are adjustable and thick tempered glass. The mirror on the inside door is cool too. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a simple upgrade in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and classic
customer_reviews.text: 1st cabinet arrived cracked on the edge. Returned and replaced for free and the new one shipped and was received before I ever made it to ups. Sure I was annoyed that the 1st arrived cracked, but I was blown away by the customer service. The cabinet itself is a perfect fit. I love that it's frameless and I think it is a sleek and classic look.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Yong

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet, great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a first-class medicine cabinet, such a huge improvement over the cabinet that was installed by the builder. And about 20%less expensive than the exact model at my local big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stylish
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit to go into our RV, since we couldn't find a special RV version. We love it. It's strong, stylish and works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Searcher

customer_reviews.title: Best Mirrored Cabinet I've Seen
customer_reviews.text: Well made. The best mirrored cabinet I've seen anywhere. The mirrored interior is a nice touch. Everything about this is quality. If I had any complaint, I would case the outside edge of the mirror with a thin band of metal. I worry about the rather thin edge of glass at the outside corner, but otherwise I have no complaints. Extremely pleased with this. Well worth the money. The frame is all metal, and very sturdy. Nicer than what the big box stores sell.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Owsley

customer_reviews.title: So happy it worked out!
customer_reviews.text: I still need to spackle and paint, but I love this cabinet. I had a cheap cabinet that stuck out before, but the Kohler cabinet fit surprisingly easy. I love the mirrored outside and inside. The glass shelves are nice too. A definite upgrade. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MarcusJinPGH412

customer_reviews.title: Great... just the wrong size...I ordered the right size
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back... it was too wide for where I wanted it. I ordered a different size and it’s perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expert needed
customer_reviews.text: It's just as described except if you're not familiar with carpentry then you will not be able to install it. It really looks nice but you need an expert to install this in your wall
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great medicine Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed yet as we are doing a full bathroom reno but after receiving we checke it our and it seems and with a mirror on the inside of the door the women of the house will use that.
customer_reviews.author: Don in Alberta

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product. The glass shelves are much better than those plastic shelves that are in most products. The only downside is that when you open the door, you have to hold onto it because it will open to wide and hit whatever it leans up against.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice medicine cabinet and much less cost than at the builders store. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking medicine cabinet.  Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: When I told my wife I was going to replace our 60-year old cabinet, she threw me a strange look and asked what I knew about installing such a thing. I said "not much but I can read instructions". That was pretty bold on my part, because I have never tackled such a project. It could have had an embarrassing conclusion ... The Kohler instructions were very clear and, lo and behold, I was able to move the existing light fixture up a bit and install the cabinet without problems. Wife was impressed by the result. Indeed, the cabinet is very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Double mirrors a bonus
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has a mirror on the outside and inside and has enough storage for in our half bathroom. It's contemporary and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B. Studt

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: The dimension in the description pictures are exact. It fits very well and good build quality. Not the cheap plastic build. Looks good as well and good price here.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact. Well packaged. Heavy. Beautiful design. Looks wonderful. Glass shelves lock in place. Non-adjustible once in place. Smooth/solid door.
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This medicine cabinet is beautiful. Definitely looks more expensive. I’d recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great looking space saver
customer_reviews.text: Love this Kohler product. It looks terrific in my master bath and allows me to keep my vanity top clear. Installation was fairly easy because the existing wall stud on one side happened to be located just where I needed it to be. I ended up using a few nails to mount because the screws that were included didn't work well for me. If you do use a few nails, be very careful when hammering them in. If you are looking for a medicine cabinet, I would strongly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet classy
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. If you want the classic in the wall type these are your baby. Easy to install and shine like a diamond. Go on...get 'em.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sleutel-Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Clear thorough directions of a quality cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Mirrors everywhere. All hardware included. Good packaging and sturdy shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy, Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Went in easily, love the appearance of the cabinet. I do wish the install holes to screw into the wall were a bit further from the top / bottom of the cabinet. I got used to it and installed without marring the inside of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley Turner

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Easy install too. Glass inside of door and back of cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unit and well built
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are easy to follow and the results are worth the time and expense.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Everything about it is quality. The inside door mirror is magnified and the back mirror is an added bonus. Came very well packed and was easy to install. I was worried about the depth (5 in.) as depth of insert opening was only 31/2-33/4 deep. It fit perfectly as the 5 in. depth includes the door. The same product costs at least $40 more in big box stores and they don't have it in stock anyhow. The price and quality of this cabinet can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks  looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful and well built medicine cabinet. love it....
customer_reviews.author: Frantz Baron

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this medicine cabinet! I now have three in my house. Been going through a remodel and this perfectly replaced the spot that the old ones were in. I can now put all my stuff in the cabinet and I couldn't do that with the old ones. I love all the mirrored surfaces on the inside and the tempered adjustable shelves.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flagge

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, love how the inside and shelves aren’t plastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, functional medicine cabinet, looks higher end too
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, functional smaller/standard size medicine cabinet with glass shelves and a mirror inside which makes it bright and easy to see things in the cabinet. Beveled glass makes it look good. Aluminum body makes it light and easy to install. Looks the part of a $300 higher end medicine cabinet at 1/3 the cost. Just bought a second one after installing the first one and liking it.
customer_reviews.author: RBradford

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, exactly what I needed for my small wall.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread Bun

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cabinet but, unfortunately, purchased one that did not fit my space.
customer_reviews.author: Strangenj

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Minimalist Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a medicine cabinet. Easy to install in the existing opening with minimal shimming. I saw a larger version at Lowe’s and was impressed with how well made it was and no superfluous enhancements.
customer_reviews.author: AL CAMUS

customer_reviews.title: Great medicine chest, at a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: What a great medicine chest, at a great price! Very sturdy construction, and how cool to have a mirror inside and outside the medicine chest? Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I had to modify my original open, but was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find size. Fits perfectly in my niche. Easy to install. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike1997

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a cheap one. Wow, I was surprised at how nice this looks and it is solid. The inside mirrors make a big difference. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre’s Girl

customer_reviews.title: It looks good
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged well. It was easy to install and it is built well
customer_reviews.author: eagle

customer_reviews.title: Mirror-Mirror on the Wall
customer_reviews.text: So much mirror - outside mirror, inside door mirror and even a mirror behind the shelves. Well built but the screws provided are junk.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stetar

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A BEAUTIFUL THING
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a high quality medicine cabinet. This Kohler product has an excellent finish. There are two adjustable glass shelves. There is a mirror anywhere they could put one. The cabinet box is bright anodized aluminum. Whether the door is open or closed this cabinet makes a nice appearance, the hinges are good quality, and I believe you would have a hard time finding a nicer medicine cabinet. There is another Kohler model of this cabinet the same width but 6" taller. You might want to consider that one.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This looks good and installs easily. For the price, this is attractive and well made. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice medicine cabinet. I was concerned that the opening size was a bit bigger than what I had, but it fit in the opening just fine. It looks awesome, so much better than the rusty '50's cabinet it replaces. The interior looks awesome with the mirrors. I was impressed with the quality of the construction. It was hard to find one this size....glad I went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to replace a 3-door mirror when we remodeled our bathroom They are very sturdy and a bit more spacious than we thought they would be. They are meant to be recessed into the wall, which wouldn't work for us, so we had to be creative about installing. We did get the installed successfully, and we love them. Just remember to leave the film on the glass until installation is over. (Thanks to a previous reviewer for that little tip.)
customer_reviews.author: Sioco

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. Great addition to the bathroom. Had to cut studs as they were too close together. That nade the install tricky but was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: theuniverseguru

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and looking (and working) great
customer_reviews.text: got rid of the old hideous med cabinet which makes me happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice medicin chest
customer_reviews.text: it is a very nice mirror and medicine chest.inside mirror too.
customer_reviews.author: ruth atkins

customer_reviews.title: Kohler medicine cabinet - worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality. The interior mirrors definitely help the unit. All metal construction was well done. I don't typically give 5 stars, but this product did impress me for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Fit well into existing wall recess. Has the look and feel of a very high quality item. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best part, the interior back is mirrored too. Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: maggy

customer_reviews.title: SIZE OF OPENING
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY TO INSTALL,LEFT DOOR OR RIGHT JUST BY TURNING OVER,PUT TOGETHER,EXCEPT FOR SHELVES
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sledgianowski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My house was built in the 60s. Sometimes it can be hard finding items that fit without making some sort of adjustment. This fit PERFECTLY where my old medicine cabinet was. It was delivered earlier than expected. Instructions were clear (especially for me since I'm not handy at all). My girlfriend loves it. Literally no complaints. The only warning I would say is be careful how you drill the screw into the framing. They strip very easily. I had to replace a couple already.
customer_reviews.author: PapaBear617

product_meta.title: Kohler K-Cb-Clr1620Fs Frameless 16 Inch X 20 Inch Aluminum Bathroom Medicine Cabinet; Recess Installation Only
product_meta.description:
With mirrored surfaces inside and outside, this 16 inch wide frameless medicine cabinet is reversible to open left or right. The mirror on the front door features a beveled edge for enhanced style. Inside, two adjustable tempered glass shelves easily accommodate your toiletries. Fully mirrored interior provides superior visibility, reflecting light to brighten the interior space. Anodized aluminum construction insures a durable rust free and chip free finish. Recessed installation requires rough opening in wall 14 inches wide x 18 inches high x 3 5/8 inches deep. Backed by KOHLER One Year Limited Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This mirrored cabinet with Silver interior features 1/2-inch beveled frameless door. Rust-free aluminum construction ensures years of use.
feature_bullets: Anodized aluminum construction with a durable rust free and chip free finish
Mirrors on back of door and interior back of cabinet
Reversible for left or right hand opening. 108 degree opening capability for easy cabinet access
